document: Dawn is a Full Stack Developer passionate about creating elegant solutions with modern web technologies.
Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Express and NestJS.
Worked at ATOM Solution as a Fullstack Developer from 2023 to 2025.
Esportify - Full-featured esports management platform designed to help organizers create, run, and scale competitive gaming tournaments
AI Portfolio - An AI-powered portfolio website that leverages natural language processing and machine learning to provide an interactive and personalized user experience.
ChroniQ - The AI-powered todo app that helps you manage your tasks efficiently and effectively.
Dawn-Blog - A modern, full-stack blog application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and more.
Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from FPT University, graduated in 2025.
Email: haidangdavid.work@gmail.com, GitHub: https://github.com/dawnn07, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dawnn07/
